title: Amazon KDP Keyword Research Strategy & Tools to Get You Books Found & Lower Your ACOS!
description:
Part 3 of 3 Part Tutorial. Stop guessing which keywords work! In Part 3 of our KDP Masterclass, we are diving deep into Keyword Research. If you want high royalties and a low ACOS, you must master how the Amazon algorithm finds your book. 

A pretty cover (Part 2) won't sell if it's invisible. Today, I’m showing you my exact process for finding high-intent, low-competition keywords that drive organic sales.

In this lesson, you will learn:
✅ How to find "Buyer Keywords" vs. "Browser Keywords"
✅ The 7-Slot Strategy: How to maximize your KDP metadata
✅ How to use Amazon Search Suggestion for free keyword gold
✅ Analyzing competitor keywords to steal their traffic using this free tool:  https://www.sellersprite.com/affiliate/LENA5

---
